mapper.select: select ap.id, ap.community_id, ap.title, ap.layout, ap.comment_nums, ap.views_nums, ap.publish_time, ap.created_time, ap.update_time, apconfig.is_comment, apconfig.is_show, apconfig.is_delete, apcontent.content, at.type from article_profile as ap, article_profile_config as apconfig, article_profile_content as apcontent, article_type as at where at.type = #{type} and ap.community_id = #{communityId} and ap.id = apconfig.article_profile_id and ap.id = apcontent.article_profile_id and ap.article_type_id = at.id
